chunk:
ArctaPHOS Repairing, Illuminating & Deep Moisturize Concentrate

Brand: ArctaPHOS

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Squalane, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Crithmum Maritimum Extract, C
Maritimum Extract, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate
